Name: Apple Manhattan
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of apple wedge, apple fan or dehydrated apple slice.
Review: Rusty gold in colour, this is a flavoursome threesome for bourbon lovers.
History: Our take on a drink created in the late 1990s by David Marsden at First on First in New York City and latterly popularised by Dale DeGroff. David's original recipe comprised just 2 ingredients, 2 oz Maker's Mark bourbon and 1 oz Berentzen Apfel Korn. Manhattan cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Apple Manhattan contains 231 calories
